      • getResponce

        var - Data to send
        Returns:
        Data received from the server

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable()
        Checks if the server is available right now.
        Returns:
        True if server is available; False otherwise.

      • promptLogin

        public int promptLogin(java.lang.String pass)
        Attempt to login to the server using current username and provided password
        Parameters:
        pass - Password to use to login to the server
        Returns:
        -1 in error; 0 in success; 1 is failure.

      • logoutUser

        public boolean logoutUser()
        Logout the current user from the server.
        Returns:
        True on success; False otherwise.

      • getStartTime

        Gets the start time of the exam.
        Returns:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        answers - Data of answers to submit.
        Returns:

      • getExamTitle

        Get the title of the current exam.
        Returns:
